titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 66) approving the renewal of import restrictions contained in the Burmese Freedom and Democracy Act of 2003, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6684) to provide for spending reduction.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-708, by Mr. Dreier.

The resolution provides for consideration of the Senate amendment to H.J.Res. 66 and for consideration of H.R. 6684. The resolution makes in order a motion offered by the chair of the Committee on Ways and Means that the House concur in the Senate amendment to H.J.Res. 66 with the amendment printed in House Report 112-708. The resolution provides for one hour of debate in both instances. The Senate amendment, the motion, and H.R. 6684 shall be considered as read. The resolution provides for one motion to recommit for H.R. 6684.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 170.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 841.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 184 (Roll no. 639).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 197 (Roll no. 640).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/19/2012--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 66) approving the renewal of import restrictions contained in the Burmese Freedom and Democracy Act of 2003, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6684) to provide for spending reduction.
